ground_truth.thought: 我想要研究量化投资在化工行业的机会。首先，收集化工行业的原材料价格数据。然后，查找五篇关于化工量化投资策略的研究报告。接着，分析八家化工企业的环保措施。最后，获取化工行业的安全生产标准。
ground_truth.name: ResearchQuantInvestmentChemicalIndustry

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'ChemicalMarketData.get_raw_material_prices', 'description': 'Get the current prices of raw materials in the chemical industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'material', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the raw material'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price', 'description': 'the current price of the raw material'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.search_papers', 'description': 'Search for academic papers on a specific topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'query', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the topic to search for'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'count', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'the number of papers to return'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'papers', 'description': 'a list of papers, each paper is a dict with title, authors, and publication date'}]}, {'name': 'ChemicalCompanyAnalysis.analyze_environmental_measures', 'description': 'Analyze the environmental measures of chemical companies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the chemical company'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'count', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'the number of companies to analyze'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'measures', 'description': 'a list of environmental measures taken by the companies'}]}, {'name': 'ChemicalIndustryStandards.get_safety_standards', 'description': 'Get the safety standards for the chemical industry.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'standards', 'description': 'a list of safety standards'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
